803580.name: Abo Khashem - Soundtrack
803580.description:
The original soundtrack for the game Abo Khashem. Scored by Zack Davidson.

Format:
320kbps, MP3, 24 tracks spanning over 1 hour.

Track List:
1. Abo Khashem Main Title (5:23)
2. Heat of the Desert (3:08)
3. Wellspring Lane (3:59)
4. Hush 'Em City (3:11)
5. Stroll to Nowhere (3:24)
6. Dynamic Duo (2:16)
7. Shukman's Groove (3:12)
8. Corner Merchants (2:06)
9. Contemplative Walk (3:09)
10. My Shoddy House (3:04)
11. Home is Where the Hearth is (4:08)
12. Coffee Break (3:45)
13. The Lounge (2:26)
14. Catopia (5:13)
15. Nine Against One (1:40)
16. Nyambience (2:47)
17. Fight of the Agile (1:53)
18. Boss Fight (2:10)
19. Shukman the Conqueror (2:52)
20. The Monologue (1:41)
21. Mr. Whiskerkins (1:38)
22. A Treacherous Climb (3:02)
23. A Proper Stage for a Grand Finale (2:17)
24. Exit Whiskerkins (0:35)
